newsitem.title: USA: Harris Corp says future growth sustainable.
newsitem.headline: Harris Corp says future growth sustainable.

text.p: Harris Corp, an international communications equipment maker, said Wednesday it was in a good position to continue to increase earnings in the future.

"We anticipate another good year of earnings growth in fiscal 1998," said Phillip Farmer, the chairman and chief executive of Harris. The company said it's 1997 fiscal year results were the sixth consecutive of double digit growth. Harris added, "Our ongoing investment in research and development, new products, and joint ventures will continue to help boost the company's growth. In addition we remain optomistic about the outlook for the market for digital t.v., wiresless communications, digital office equipment and power semiconductors where we are focusing our efforts. This, along with the strength of our other core businesses, put Harris in a good position for sustained growth in the years ahead."
